oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Current concerns about veterinary product use and cowcalf fertility
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Larson, Bob L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle
breeding
fertility
pregnancy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Monitoring and ensuring the fertility of breeding cattle and protecting them from pregnancy-wasting disease are key veterinary services provided to beef cattle clients. Questions about the effect of insecticides, vaccines, and other technologies to improve or compromise bovine reproduction require a thorough investigation of the available evidence to supply clients with informed recommendations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2013; 36-38
